description:
Take the ICD-10 with you in your WebOS device! ICD-10 for WebOS has both an Internal database for offline searches as well as handy tools to query online ICD-10 databases.

In order to use Internal database (default screen), just manually scroll through the list and tap to select the diagnosis. ** Search is best done by typing to filter by Name or ICD Code **

The availability of offline and online searches provide flexibility to maximise the usefulness of this program. You can use the Internal database for quick offline searches which do not require an Internet connection. The optional  Online search mode allows you to refine your search and queries the WHO and German ICD-Code sites.
versionNote: UI fixed. Search internal database by Name or ICD code. Added German ICD-Code site to the online search option.
